results.title: Cholesterol embolism after cardiac catheterization mimicking infective endocarditis.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Embolism_Cholesterol @DISEASE_MESH:D017700 @@@Cholesterol embolism@@@ after cardiac catheterization mimicking @<m>DISEASE_Endocarditis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004696 @@@infective endocarditis@@@.

citations.NLM: Maki T, Izumi C, Miyake M, Izumi T, Takahashi S, Himura Y, Konishi T. Cholesterol embolism after cardiac catheterization mimicking infective endocarditis. Intern Med. 2005 Oct;44(10):1060-3. PMID: 16293917

results.title: GTPase activating protein function of p85 facilitates uptake and recycling of the beta1 integrin.
results.text_hl: To better understand the regulatory mechanisms controlling adhesion formation and uptake and the use of these complexes by @SPECIES_1280 @@@Staphylococcus aureus@@@, the primary etiologic agent in @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@, @DISEASE_Bacteremia @DISEASE_MESH:D016470 @@@bacteremia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Endocarditis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004696 @@@endocarditis@@@, we investigated the mechanism of inhibition by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Stankiewicz TE, Haaning KL, Owens JM, Jordan AS, Gammon K, Bruns HA, McDowell SA. GTPase activating protein function of p85 facilitates uptake and recycling of the beta1 integrin. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2010 Jan 1;391(1):443-8. PMID: 19914208
